messages.message: Noticing that credit usage isn't showing for me https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/settings/usage. This is on prod for my community account. I just ran a query so am sure that I do have some credit usage today. Is this a known issue?
@Victor Zeng can you take a look here?
@avi What exactly do you mean by "ran a query"? Converse, build, and batch all show up as expected for me.
Also, sometimes it takes a while for usage to flush from license-service to the db.
"ran a query" = "used some AI Hub credits". Specifically I ran the doc summarisation app
Good to see that it's working for you. Hm, I'm still not seeing anything come up for yesterday's usage here. See the screenshot below of the app run.

Also I've used this account a fair amount but the history is blank. Is the usage table only a particular day's usage? The UI implies this at the moment but it feels like the date based usage filtering makes it really hard to view overall usage.

The reason I started looking into this is because I was reviewing a PFR where customers wanted to see the total usage for a particular app and I was thinking they may be able to find it easily here - [EPD-1636] Allow to see app credit consumption on AiHub - Jira (atlassian.net (http://atlassian.net)) (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1636)
